snippet.title: Ponpu trailer
snippet.description:
Bombs On! 

Get ready to break some eggs in this frantic multiplayer party-game, featuring both online & offline 4-player chaos.

Ponpu mixes classic gameplay with new crazy mechanics, all packaged in one of the coolest, slickest art-styles ever seen!

Save the world from the almight Duck-God in the campaign, or go beat up your friends & foes in a range of hectic multiplayer game-modes. 

The mayhem starts fall 2020! 
Developed by the award-winning gang at Purple Tree Studio
